topSectionSubTitle: Get free quotes from the best moving firms, hand-picked based on availability, affordability and customer reviews.
RecommendedText_2: They offer affordable move help and have received excellent ratings.
RecommendedText_3: The estimated time for this move is :expectedTime hours.
RecommendedText_4: It be quicker than that though, since multiple people are working with the move!
RecommendedTextFlyttsmart_1: We can help you with your move on the selected date.
RecommendedTextFlyttsmart_2: We can also help you with packing and move cleaning if you want
hasGottenHelpFromUs: have already received help from us

CleaningDescription1: Leaving a cleaned residence is mandatory, so make sure it’s perfect to avoid re-cleaning it. Our cleaning partners have satisfied customer guarantee and will fix any eventual issues without any extra cost.
CleaningDescription2_Text: Read more about what is included
CleaningDatePickerTitle: When do you want the cleaning?
CleaningOption1_SubTitle: Make sure to be thorough to avoid re-cleaning.
CleaningOption2_SubTitle: Moving is work enough as is, let the pros clean!Always with satisfied customer guarantee.Discounted when booked along move help!
PackagingDescription: Packing is the part of moving that takes the most time, on average 70 hours for a 2 room apartment. Avoid stress and sore backs and le the pros pack for you, included are also moving boxes and the liability insurance will also cover things packed in the boxes.
PackagingOption1_SubTitle: Start at least 2-3 weeks ahead of time.
PackagingOption2_SubTitle: Professional help with packing moving boxes. Loan of moving boxes included. A normal kitchen takes about four hours. Of course, you can get help packing the entire home, as well as unpacking at your new address.
MovingBoxesDescription: Forget the stress of finding, buying and transporting loads of moving boxes and borrow high-quality boxes from the service provider. Decide when you what them, we recommend a date well in advance of the move so you have plenty of time to pack.
MovingBoxesOption1_SubTitle: You need at least {residenceSize} good quality boxes.
MovingBoxesOption2_SubTitle: Borrow moving boxes from the moving company. *A delivery fee of 500 kr will be added.
StorageDescription: Are you moving to a smaller place, or do you have things that needs to do a stopover? If so, temporary storage is a excellent option. We’ll make sure your things are stored securely until you need them. The service provider will contact you for more information.
StorageText: I want to know more. Contact me!
FAQ1_Answer1_movehelp: Booking move help is a good idea since professional moving companies have experience packing and handling furniture and belongings in a safe and efficient manner. They have the right equipment and resources to handle heavy lifting and transport your belongings securely to your new home.
FAQ1_Answer2_movehelp: Additionally, you save time and energy by entrusting the move to experts, allowing you to focus on other important aspects of the move.
FAQ1_Answer1_moveclean: Booking move cleaning is a good idea since professional cleaning companies have the knowledge and expertise required to thoroughly clean your old residence and ensure it meets the inspection or handover requirements. They are equipped with specialized cleaning tools and products to deal with the toughest stains and dirt.
FAQ1_Answer2_moveclean: Additionally, our providers offer a customer satisfaction guarantee, which means that if the new residents are not satisfied, they will perform a re-cleaning free of charge.
FAQ2: What is included in the service?
FAQ2_Answer1: This is included in move help:
FAQ2_Answer2_3: Transport to your new address or other designated location
FAQ2_Answer3: Many service providers also offer additional services such as packing and temporary storage. You can add these services after you picked a service provider.
FAQ3_Answer1: After the booking is done a confirmation will be sent to you by email and the selected service provider will contact you to make sure all information is correct and to decide the last details, time and such.
moveSummaryHeadLine: All prices are presented after: RUT-deduction
mainTitle_ConfirmationPageItem_7: You have chosen a quality assured service provider.
subtitle_ConfirmationPageItem_9: We have received your booking for move help.
pageDescription_ConfirmationPageItem_10: You will receive an email confirmation shortly with information about what happens next.
tailoredMoveOfferNotValid: This tailored move offer is no longer valid, contact us and we will come up with a new one!

PUBLIC_OFFERING.title: Move help
PUBLIC_OFFERING.intro: At Flyttsmart, we want to make moving easy, that's why we collected the best and most qualified moving firms in Sweden. <0>Read more</0>
PUBLIC_OFFERING.sloganExternalFlyttsmart: Get a price and book immediately!

PACKAGES.packagingTextbasic: We move. You do the rest.
PACKAGES.packagingTextstandard: We move and clean. You pack.

movehelp.text_1: This is included in move help:
movehelp.bullet_3: Transport to your new address or other designated location

moveclean.text_1: Leaving a cleaned residence is mandatory, so make sure it’s perfect to avoid re-cleaning it. Our cleaning partners have satisfied customer guarantee and will fix any eventual issues without any extra cost.
moveclean.link_1: Read more about what is included

productPackaging.text_1: Packing is the part of moving that takes the most time, on average 70 hours for a 2 room apartment. Avoid stress and sore backs and let the pros pack for you, included are also moving boxes and the liability insurance will also cover things packed in the boxes.

productMoveboxes.text_1: When booking packing, you always get to borrow moving boxes, including home delivery and pick-up. Packing material costs might apply.
productMoveboxes.text_2: We can however offer moving boxes in combination with other packages, though a cost for renting/buying the movingboxes, in addition to delivery fees, may apply.

MOVESUMMARY.howItWorksAnswer1: Fill out our form in just a minute – then your moving coordinator takes over. We'll review your details and get back to you with a personalized quote that fits your needs.
MOVESUMMARY.howItWorksAnswer2: Your moving coordinator will stay in touch with you every step of the way and is available if you have any questions.
MOVESUMMARY.question1: Do you have any special requests or questions about move help?
MOVESUMMARY.answer1: We are here to make your move as smooth as possible. Ask us anything about your move – from planning to packing and transport. Our team of experts is ready to help, completely free of charge!
MOVESUMMARY.question2: What’s included in the move help?
MOVESUMMARY.answer2_section1: Relocation assistance includes collection of your entire household, assistance with carrying and transport to either your new address or another desired location.
MOVESUMMARY.answer2_section2: Many moving companies offer additional services for an additional fee. In our quote, you can choose which extra services you wish to receive price information for, such as:
MOVESUMMARY.answer3: We at Flyttsmart only work with carefully selected moving companies that, through checks and follow-up, we can ensure meet our high standards. We quality-assure all our partners and can thus offer a smooth and reliable moving experience. When you choose a moving company from us, we thereby guarantee that they:
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem1: Carry out the cleaning at the right price and with fair terms, so you get what you expect without hidden costs.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem2: Offers a quality guarantee that ensures your belongings are handled with care and precision.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem3: Have full liability insurance to cover any damage or loss during the move.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem4: Has the necessary traffic permits from the Swedish Transport Agency, which guarantees legal and safe transport.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem5: Handles everything about the box deduction for you.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem6: Has a history of high ratings and positive reviews from previous customers.
MOVESUMMARY.movingItem1: Loaning and delivery of moving boxes
MOVESUMMARY.movingItem5: Removal/recycling of things you want to get rid of

QUOTATIONS.quotationHeader: What do you want quotes on?
QUOTATIONS.quotationSubtitle: Tell us a little about your move, and we'll get back to you with a free quote shortly.
QUOTATIONS.answerQuestions3Minutes: It takes less than 3 minutes but will save you hours in the end.
QUOTATIONS.typeOfResidence: What type of residence is it?
QUOTATIONS.additionalSpace: Do you have things in storage or other area in addition to the living area?
QUOTATIONS.additionalSpacePopup: Refers to areas with things to be moved but which do not belong to the living area, eg attic, cellar, garage or storage .
QUOTATIONS.additionalSpaceTextAreaPlaceholder: Brief description of the type of area and amount of stuff in it.
QUOTATIONS.parkingPopup: Briefly describe the parking situation and how long it is to the nearest parking if a moving truck is unable to park within 10m.
QUOTATIONS.heavyItem: Do you have items that require heavy lifting?
QUOTATIONS.heavyItemSubtitle: For example, piano, gun cabinet or marble table.
QUOTATIONS.whenDoYouWantMovehelp: When do you want move help?
QUOTATIONS.textAreaPlaceholder: Extra info or requests about the move
QUOTATIONS.otherOption: Do you want a quote for more services?
QUOTATIONS.otherOptionSubtitle: Select the services you are interested in and we will include price proposals in your quotations.
QUOTATIONS.elevatorPopup: A lift is considered large if there is room for a 120cm bed in it.
QUOTATIONS.whichFloor: Which floor is the residence on?
QUOTATIONS.whichFloorHelper: Example: ground floor = 0, one flight up = 1, etc.
QUOTATIONS.heavyItemPopup: We need to know this so that the moving company can bring the right equipment and handle your items in the best way.
QUOTATIONS.otherCommentsPopup: Describe other things about the move that may affect the time taken, for example:
QUOTATIONS.otherCommentsPopupBullet1: If the entire household is not to be moved
QUOTATIONS.anythingElseToKnow: Want to add something more about your move?
QUOTATIONS.additionalServicesPopupText1: The moving firm will pack your things for you. Eveything packed by them is covered by the liability insurance, loan of moving boxes included.
QUOTATIONS.additionalServicesPopupText2: Avoid getting your own moving boxes and borrowing from the moving company. Shipping charges may apply.
QUOTATIONS.additionalServicesPopupText3: Get help getting rid of thing you no longer need.
QUOTATIONS.additionalServicesPopupText4: Temporary storage of your belongings if your move out and in do not occur on the same day.
QUOTATIONS.additionalServicesPopupText5: get help to disassemble and assemble furniture that otherwise does not come in/out of the homes. Applies only to furniture in connection with the move and not new furniture.
QUOTATIONS.movehelpDatePopupText1: Pick a desired date even if you are not yet 100% certain of when you’ll move, you can always adjust the date at a later point.
QUOTATIONS.movehelpDatePopupText2: Good to know: Moving firms often add a surcharge on weekends or holidays.
QUOTATIONS.movecleanDatePopupText1: Pick a day when your residence is completely emptied of furniture and moving boxes, we recommend a day close to when the new owners move in.
QUOTATIONS.movecleanDatePopupText2: Good to know: Cleaning firms often add a surcharge on weekends or holidays.
QUOTATIONS.confirmationSecondSubtitle: Your moving coordinator will get back to you shortly with a quote and help you through the process.
QUOTATIONS.confirmationSecondSubtitleOutsideWorking: Your moving coordinator will get back to you on the next business day with a quote and help you through the process.
QUOTATIONS.quotationIsSentTo: A confirmation email has been sent to
QUOTATIONS.quotationIsSentToIn5Minutes: A confirmation email will be sent to {{email}} within 5 minutes.
QUOTATIONS.dateExtraInfo: You can always change the day later.
